attributes.action: BACK TRACK ON HIS 10P TAX BAN
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: It is clear that Mr Brown wants to hit the low paid  once again. what happened to Labour being for the working class man. I am low erner and this month I am £40 worse off .

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
